all_content_what_is_fee_used_for: What is the Fastwork service fee used for?
what_is_accumulated_income_fee_title: What is the service fee based on accumulated income?
what_is_accumulated_income_fee_descripti: This is a pre-declared service fee based on the total amount each time for a freelancer, calculated according to the Fastwork member tier. The member tier is determined based on the accumulated income over the last 3 months, calculated up to the project report creation and completion date.
tier_table_header_name: Details of service fee calculation are as follows:
tier_table_headers_accumulated_income: Accumulated income over the last 3 months up to the present
tier_table_note: Accumulated income over the past 3 months will be calculated based on approved projects.
how_is_fee_calculated_section_title: How is the service fee calculated?
how_is_fee_calculated_section_descriptio: The system will calculate the fee based on the total accumulated income over the last 3 months up to the present date, including only approved projects.
The percentage of the service fee for each quote will be calculated as soon as the freelancer creates the quote.
If the quote is edited, the system will adjust and recalculate the service fee percentage based on the edit date.
how_is_fee_calculated_section_freelancer: Freelancers can refer to more detailed information through the following examples.
how_is_fee_calculated_section_calculatio: Income from completed projects over the last 3 months, calculated up to the quote creation date.
Determine the corresponding member tier based on the accumulated income.
Apply the service fee percentage corresponding to the member tier for the project.
example_1_subtitle: No projects approved in the current month
example_1_details_status: In June, no new projects have been approved.
example_1_details_calculation_intro: Therefore, the service fee percentage as of June 10, 2024, will be as follows:
example_1_note: If a freelancer creates a quote on June 10, 2024, the service fee for that project will be 10%.
example_1_additional_note: Note: If the quote is edited, the service fee percentage will be recalculated based on the edit date.
example_2_subtitle: Projects approved this month up to the present date
example_2_details_status: In June, one project has been approved with income
example_2_details_calculation_intro: Therefore, the service fee percentage as of June 20, 2024, will be as follows:
example_2_note: If a freelancer creates a quote on June 20, 2024, the service fee for that project will be 9%.
example_2_additional_note: Note: If the quote is edited, the service fee percentage will be recalculated based on the edit date.
example_3_details_status: April is no longer included; it is replaced by July.
example_3_details_calculation_intro: Therefore, the service fee percentage as of July 1, 2024, will be as follows:
example_3_note: If a freelancer creates a quote on July 1, 2024, the service fee for that project will be 10%.
example_3_additional_note: Note: If there is a quote policy, the service fee percentage will be recalculated based on the revision source.
fastlane_fee_purpose_quest: What is the Fastwork service fee used for?
fastlane_fee_purpose: The service fee on our system will be used to maintain and improve the platform to meet the needs of both freelancers and employers. This includes enhancing the user experience on the platform, boosting revenue, promoting the brand to attract more users, and creating more job opportunities.
